New Records: LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists. Anthony Davis scored 31 points with nine rebounds, three steals, and two blocked shots. Domantas Sabonis had a triple-double with 29 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists
Key Match Events: The Lakers opened the fourth quarter with a 21-0 scoring run, including 16 points from LeBron James. LeBron James made a key three-pointer and Rui Hachimura scored a crucial dunk to help the Lakers secure the win. The Kings cut the deficit to two with less than a minute to play but couldn't tie the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Lakers improved to 3-0 on the young NBA season with the victory. The game was highlighted by significant performances from both LeBron James and Anthony Davis, and the Lakers' ability to maintain a lead despite a strong challenge from the Sacramento Kings.
Others: The game was played at Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles, California.
